languages.text: Абордажные группы из экипажа благословенно{mf|го|й} Лорд-капитана обрушились на головы повстанцев в десантных челноках. Благодаря умелым пилотам это молниеносное наступление расчленило войска мятежников, перекрыло им пути отступления и полностью дезорганизовало. Изолированные и напуганные группы бунтовщиков были уничтожены в течение нескольких суток. Остатки мятежников отступили в малозначимые островные районы. Потери в экипаже были неприятны, но невелики.

traits.locale_text: Абордажные группы из экипажа благословенно{mf|го|й} Лорд-капитана обрушились на головы повстанцев в десантных челноках. Благодаря умелым пилотам это молниеносное наступление расчленило войска мятежников, перекрыло им пути отступления и полностью дезорганизовало. Изолированные и напуганные группы бунтовщиков были уничтожены в течение нескольких суток. Остатки мятежников отступили в малозначимые островные районы. Потери в экипаже были неприятны, но невелики.

languages.text: The boarding parties from the blessed Lord Captain's crew descended upon the heads of the rebels in their landing shuttles. Thanks to the deft manoeuvring of the pilots, this blistering attack scattered the rebel forces, cutting off their paths of retreat and leaving them in total disarray. Isolated and demoralised groups of rebels were picked off over several days. The surviving insurrectionists retreated to island regions of little significance. Crew losses were regrettable but minor.
languages.original_text: Абордажные группы из экипажа благословенно{mf|го|й} Лорд-капитана обрушились на головы повстанцев в десантных челноках. Благодаря умелым пилотам это молниеносное наступление расчленило войска мятежников, перекрыло им пути отступления и полностью дезорганизовало. Изолированные и напуганные группы бунтовщиков были уничтожены в течение нескольких суток. Остатки мятежников отступили в малозначимые островные районы. Потери в экипаже были неприятны, но невелики.

Thanks to the deft maneuvering of the pilots, this blistering attack scattered the rebel forces, cutting off their paths of retreat and leaving them in total disarray. Isolated and demoralized groups of rebels were picked off over several days. The surviving insurrectionists retreated to island regions of little significance. Crew losses were regrettable but minor.

Thanks to the deft manoeuvring of the pilots, this blistering attack scattered the rebel forces, cutting off their paths of retreat and leaving them in total disarray. Isolated and demoralised groups of rebels were picked off over several days. The surviving insurrectionists retreated to island regions of little significance. Crew losses were regrettable but minor.

languages.text: 祝福受けしロード・キャプテンの乗組員から加わった一行は、着陸用シャトルで反乱軍の頭上から襲撃を実行した。パイロットの器用な操縦の結果、この激しい攻撃で反乱軍は散り散りになり、退路を断たれて完全な混乱状態に陥った。孤立して士気を失った反乱軍のグループは、数日間にわたって狙い撃ちにされた。生き残った暴徒は重要性があまり認められない離島地域に撤退した。乗組員の損失は遺憾であるものの、少数であった。
languages.original_text: The boarding parties from the blessed Lord Captain's crew descended upon the heads of the rebels in their landing shuttles. Thanks to the deft manoeuvring of the pilots, this blistering attack scattered the rebel forces, cutting off their paths of retreat and leaving them in total disarray. Isolated and demoralised groups of rebels were picked off over several days. The surviving insurrectionists retreated to island regions of little significance. Crew losses were regrettable but minor.

traits.locale_text: 祝福受けしロード・キャプテンの乗組員から加わった一行は、着陸用シャトルで反乱軍の頭上から襲撃を実行した。パイロットの器用な操縦の結果、この激しい攻撃で反乱軍は散り散りになり、退路を断たれて完全な混乱状態に陥った。孤立して士気を失った反乱軍のグループは、数日間にわたって狙い撃ちにされた。生き残った暴徒は重要性があまり認められない離島地域に撤退した。乗組員の損失は遺憾であるものの、少数であった。

languages.text: 神皇保佑的舰长大人带领的陆战队，乘坐着登陆穿梭机，从叛军的头顶袭来。在飞行员的巧妙操纵下，这次猛烈的攻击分散了叛军的兵力，切断了他们的退路，令叛军彻底陷入混乱。几天之后，那群孤立无援、士气低落的叛军被一网打尽，逃过一劫的叛乱分子撤退到了经济意义不大的岛屿地区。尽管船员的损失令人遗憾，但所幸伤亡并不严重。
languages.original_text: The boarding parties from the blessed Lord Captain's crew descended upon the heads of the rebels in their landing shuttles. Thanks to the deft manoeuvring of the pilots, this blistering attack scattered the rebel forces, cutting off their paths of retreat and leaving them in total disarray. Isolated and demoralised groups of rebels were picked off over several days. The surviving insurrectionists retreated to island regions of little significance. Crew losses were regrettable but minor.

traits.locale_text: 神皇保佑的舰长大人带领的陆战队，乘坐着登陆穿梭机，从叛军的头顶袭来。在飞行员的巧妙操纵下，这次猛烈的攻击分散了叛军的兵力，切断了他们得退路，令叛军彻底陷入混乱。几天之后，那群孤立无援、士气低落的叛军被一网打尽，逃过一劫的叛乱分子撤退到了经济意义不大的岛屿地区。尽管船员的损失令人遗憾，但所幸伤亡并不严重。

languages.text: Los grupos de abordaje de la tripulación {mf|del bendito Lord Capitán|de la bendita Lord Capitán} descendieron sobre los rebeldes en sus naves de desembarco. Gracias a las hábiles maniobras de los pilotos, esta feroz ofensiva hizo que las fuerzas rebeldes se dispersaran, cortándoles el paso y obligándoles a huir en desbandada. Muchos grupos de rebeldes, aislados y desmoralizados, fueron exterminados uno por uno durante el transcurso de varios días. Los insurgentes que sobrevivieron se replegaron a regiones insulares de escasa importancia. Hubo bajas entre la tripulación; mínimas, pero aun así lamentables.
languages.original_text: The boarding parties from the blessed Lord Captain's crew descended upon the heads of the rebels in their landing shuttles. Thanks to the deft manoeuvring of the pilots, this blistering attack scattered the rebel forces, cutting off their paths of retreat and leaving them in total disarray. Isolated and demoralised groups of rebels were picked off over several days. The surviving insurrectionists retreated to island regions of little significance. Crew losses were regrettable but minor.

traits.locale_text: Los grupos de abordaje de la tripulación {mf|del bendito Lord Capitán|de la bendita Lord Capitán} descendieron sobre los rebeldes en sus naves de desembarco. Gracias a las hábiles maniobras de los pilotos, esta feroz ofensiva hizo que las fuerzas rebeldes se dispersaran, cortándoles el paso y obligándoles a huir en desbandada. Muchos grupos de rebeldes, aislados y desmoralizados, fueron exterminados uno por uno durante el transcurso de varios días. Los insurgentes que sobrevivieron se replegaron a regiones insulares de escasa importancia. Hubo bajas entre la tripulación; mínimas, pero aun así lamentables.

languages.text: Die Landetrupps der Crew des gesegneten Lord Captain fielen in ihren Landeshuttles von oben über die Rebellen her. Dank der geschickten Steuerung durch die Piloten zerstreute der Angriff die Rebellentruppen, schnitt ihre Rückzugswege ab und sorgte für völliges Chaos in ihren Reihen. In den nächsten Tage wurden immer wieder isolierte und demoralisierte Rebellengruppen aufgegriffen. Die überlebenden Aufständischen zogen sich in unbedeutende Inselregionen zurück. Die Verluste bei der Crew waren bedauernswert, aber geringfügig.
languages.original_text: The boarding parties from the blessed Lord Captain's crew descended upon the heads of the rebels in their landing shuttles. Thanks to the deft manoeuvring of the pilots, this blistering attack scattered the rebel forces, cutting off their paths of retreat and leaving them in total disarray. Crew losses were regrettable but minor.

languages.text: Les membres choisis de l'équipage {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} embarquèrent dans leurs navettes pour partir à l'assaut des rebelles. Grâce aux manœuvres habiles de leurs pilotes, cette attaque-éclair dispersa les forces adverses, coupant leurs routes de repli et les plongeant dans un chaos total. Les jours qui suivirent permirent de capturer un certain nombre de groupes de contestataires isolés et démoralisés, tandis que les insurgés survivants se retiraient dans des îles sans grande valeur. De son côté, l'équipage n'essuya que quelques pertes mineures.
languages.original_text: The boarding parties from the blessed Lord Captain's crew descended upon the heads of the rebels in their landing shuttles. Thanks to the deft manoeuvring of the pilots, this blistering attack scattered the rebel forces, cutting off their paths of retreat and leaving them in total disarray. Isolated and demoralised groups of rebels were picked off over several days. The surviving insurrectionists retreated to island regions of little significance. Crew losses were regrettable but minor.

languages.text: Yüce Lord Kaptan'ın mürettebatına mensup baskın ekipleri, isyancıların tam üzerine indi. Pilotlar ustaca manevralarıyla ortalığı kasıp kavurdu. İsyancı kuvvetler dağıtıldı, kaçış yolları kesildi ve tam bir keşmekeş yaşandı. Köşeye sıkışmış, morali bozuk isyancı grupları, birkaç günlük bir sürede teker teker vuruldu. Hayatta kalan asiler, önemsiz ada bölgelerine çekildi. Mürettebat kayıpları ne kadar hüzün verici olsa da asgari düzeydeydi.
languages.original_text: The boarding parties from the blessed Lord Captain's crew descended upon the heads of the rebels in their landing shuttles. Thanks to the deft manoeuvring of the pilots, this blistering attack scattered the rebel forces, cutting off their paths of retreat and leaving them in total disarray. Isolated and demoralised groups of rebels were picked off over several days. The surviving insurrectionists retreated to island regions of little significance. Crew losses were regrettable but minor.

İsyancı kuvvetler dağıtıldı, kaçış yolları kesildi ve tam bir keşmekeş yaşandı. Köşeye sıkışmış, morali bozuk isyancı gruplarının birkaç günlük bir sürede teker teker vuruldu. Hayatta kalan asiler, önemsiz ada bölgelerine çekildi. Mürettebat kayıpları ne kadar hüzün verici olsa da asgari düzeydeydi.
